item.description:
We're celebrating with Rose...it's her big day! And who doesn't like to celebrate???

Come on out and dance the night away with us. McDonald/Teague is providing the entertainment...what a fun night we have in store for Rose. 

Join us...and make sure that you give Rose a big Birthday hug when you see her. It's her day and she is the STAR!!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Dancin' With The Star...Rose Blum... The Birthday Girl!
